entry.title: Tahoe Sunspot Basket Tooled Longhorn Inlay Bronc Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

Beautifully crafted of USA leather with hand tooled basket weave design. Noseband accented with silver studded sun spots. Center of basket weave tooling adorned with longhorn cutout and cowhair inlay. Stylish yet durable.
  • Beautifully crafted USA Leather
  • Hand tooled basket weave design
  • Longhorn cutout with cowhair inlay
  • Noseband accented with sun spots
  • Adjustable noseband

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Basket Tooled Bronc Halter - USA Leather
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

Adorn your horse and step out in style with this hand-tooled basket weave halter. Features double layered leather at bend points and solid brass hardware.

entry.title: Tahoe Silverado Series Cross Hair On Nylon Bronc Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

Stunning Western nylon bronc halter made from quality double stitched nylon with a hand tooled floral design on leather noseband. Leather tooling accented with a cross hair inlay in the center, edged with sunspots, and antique parachute conchos on each end.
  • Made from quality double stitched nylon
  • Hand tooled floral design on leather noseband
  • Noseband accented with cross hair inlay in the center and edged with sunspots
  • Antique parachute conchos on noseband ends

entry.title: Tahoe Cross Hair On Nylon Bronc Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

A beautiful bronc halter made from quality double stitched nylon with a hand tooled floral design on the leather noseband. Leather tooling accented with a crosshair inlay in the center, edged with sunspots, and unique cross conchos on each end.
  • Made from quality double stitched nylon
  • Hand tooled floral design on leather noseband
  • Noseband accented with crosshair inlay in the center and edged with sunspots
  • Unique cross conchos at each end of noseband

entry.title: Tahoe Silverado Series Peace Sign Nylon Bronc Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

Peace be with you! This handsome Silverado bronc halter is made from quality double stitched nylon with a hand tooled floral design on leather noseband. The noseband is accented with a hand tool peace sign inlay with sunspots in the center, edged with white stitching. Antique parachute conchos on each end add a very nice touch.
  • Hand tooled design on leather noseband
  • Noseband accented with tooled and sunspot peace sign inlay in the center and edged with sunspots
  • Antique parachute conchos on noseband ends
  • Made with quality double stitched nylon

entry.title: Tahoe Silverado Series Crystal Cross Nylon Bronc Halters Bargain Bin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 29.99

Stunning Silverado nylon bronc halter made from quality double stitched nylon with a hand tooled floral design on leather noseband. Leather tooling accented with a cross crystal inlay in the center, edged with sunspots, and antique parachute conchos on each end.

Condition note: these bronc halters are new, but the crystals in the cross on the noseband may be loose and may need glued or secured back into place.

  • Made from quality double stitched nylon
  • Hand tooled floral design on leather noseband
  • Noseband accented with cross of crystals inlaid in the center and edged with sunspots
  • Antique parachute conchos on noseband ends

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patriotic Hand-Painted American Flag Bronc Halter with Crystals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

Show off your American’s pride with this patriotic nylon bronc halter! This stunning hand-painted bronc halter by Tahoe Tack features the iconic red, white, and blue stars and stripes of the American flag on the noseband and is adorned with beautiful crystal accents.

  • HAND-PAINTED LEATHER AMERICAN FLAG NOSEBAND - our hand tooled and painted leather was crafted by skilled artisans for a world-class finish that is sure to stun at shows or in parades.

  • HIGH QUALITY DESIGN - our bronc halters are made from thick, double-layered stitched leather and a sturdy nylon body that is designed to hold up strong for years to come.
  • FEATURES SUNSPOTS AND CRYSTAL CONCHOS - this flashy halter is adorned with sunspots and crystals on the noseband, and crystals on the hardware for the cheeks and crown.
  • PATRIOTIC RED, WHITE, AND BLUE DESIGN - show your American pride with this gorgeous halter featuring the colors of the flag and adorned with sunspot conchos and flashy crystals.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this halter will fit most average sized horses such as Quarter Horses and Thoroughbreds thanks to its adjustable design.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Basket Weave USA Leather Heart Inlay Bronc Halter - Four Fun Colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 34.99

Tahoe Tack’s Basket Weave American Leather Heart Inlay Bronc Halter is a uniquely designed ostrich print leather heart inlay bronc halter that is made from high-grade American leather by Wickett & Craig. This opulent halter features a basket weave design that is hand-tooled by skilled leather craftsmen for a stunning finish. Our halters are available   in three heart inlay colors: Pink, Lime Green, Purple, and Sky Blue.

  • MADE FROM AMERICAN LEATHER - this bronc halter is made from high-grade American leather by Wickett & Craig. This leather is unmatched in its quality and suppleness and only improves with age.

  • HAND-TOOLED DESIGN - this halter features a basket weave design that is hand-tooled by skilled leather craftsmen for a stunning finish.
  • MADE WITH STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - this halter features durable and beautiful stainless steel hardware that is rust proof and will look beautiful for years to come.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this halter will fit most average sized horses such as Quarter Horses and Thoroughbreds thanks to its adjustable design.
  • AVAILABLE IN FOUR COLORS - this attractive halter comes in three heart inlay colors: Pink, Lime Green, Purple, and Sky Blue.
